name: Dagger of Venom
description: A deadly dagger enchanted with a potent venom.
looks: The dagger has a sleek and sharp blade with a glowing green edge. The hilt is made of black leather adorned with small emerald gemstones.

special_effects.venomous_strike: Each successful hit has a chance to poison the target, dealing additional damage over time.

name: Emerald Ring
description: A beautiful ring adorned with a large emerald gemstone.
looks: The ring is made of solid gold and features intricate engravings along the band. The centerpiece is a large emerald gemstone that glimmers in the light.

name: Wand of Healing
description: A magical wand that can be used to heal wounds and restore health.
looks: The wand has a shimmering white shaft with a crystal at the tip. It radiates a soft healing glow.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Ancient Scroll
description: A weathered scroll containing ancient spells and incantations.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment and is bound with a ribbon. It is covered in cryptic symbols and runes.

special_effects.spellbook: Allows the user to learn new spells and increase spell power.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Longsword of the Forest
description: A magical longsword that draws power from the energies of the forest.
looks: The longsword has a blade made of polished steel with intricate nature-themed engravings. The hilt is crafted from solid oak and decorated with leaf motifs.

special_effects.forest_spirit_blessing: 10% chance to heal the wielder for a portion of damage dealt.

name: Spear of the Sea
description: A mystical spear with the power of the sea.
looks: The spear is made of a shining sea-blue metal, with intricate wave patterns etched into the blade. The shaft is wrapped in seaweed, giving it a unique and mysterious appearance.

special_weapon_skills.Spearsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy with spears.

special_effects.Aqua Strike: Has a chance to deal additional water damage upon successful hit.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that restores health and vitality.
looks: The staff is made of polished ivory and adorned with intricate carvings of healing symbols. It emits a soft, healing glow.

name: Longbow
description: A powerful bow that can shoot arrows with great accuracy and range.
looks: The Longbow is made of polished wood with intricate carvings. It is taller than most bows and has a strong, sturdy construction.

special_effects.long_range_shot: Arrows shot from this bow have increased range and accuracy.
